00035 class Zend_Config_Xml extends Zend_Config

00040     const XML_NAMESPACE = 'http://framework.zend.com/xml/zend-config-xml/1.0/';
00041 
00047     protected $_skipExtends = false;

00068     public function __construct($xml, $section = null, $options = false)
00069     {
00070         if (empty($xml)) {
00071             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00072             throw new Zend_Config_Exception('Filename is not set');
00073         }
00074 
00075         $allowModifications = false;
00076         if (is_bool($options)) {
00077             $allowModifications = $options;
00078         } elseif (is_array($options)) {
00079             if (isset($options['allowModifications'])) {
00080                 $allowModifications = (bool) $options['allowModifications'];
00081             }
00082             if (isset($options['skipExtends'])) {
00083                 $this->_skipExtends = (bool) $options['skipExtends'];
00084             }
00085         }
00086 
00087         set_error_handler(array($this, '_loadFileErrorHandler')); // Warnings and errors are suppressed
00088         if (strstr($xml, '<?xml')) {
00089             $config = simplexml_load_string($xml);
00090         } else {
00091             $config = simplexml_load_file($xml);
00092         }
00093 
00094         restore_error_handler();
00095         // Check if there was a error while loading file
00096         if ($this->_loadFileErrorStr !== null) {
00097             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00098             throw new Zend_Config_Exception($this->_loadFileErrorStr);
00099         }
00100 
00101         if ($section === null) {
00102             $dataArray = array();
00103             foreach ($config as $sectionName => $sectionData) {
00104                 $dataArray[$sectionName] = $this->_processExtends($config, $sectionName);
00105             }
00106 
00107             parent::__construct($dataArray, $allowModifications);
00108         } else if (is_array($section)) {
00109             $dataArray = array();
00110             foreach ($section as $sectionName) {
00111                 if (!isset($config->$sectionName)) {
00112                     require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00113                     throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Section '$sectionName' cannot be found in $xml");
00114                 }
00115 
00116                 $dataArray = array_merge($this->_processExtends($config, $sectionName), $dataArray);
00117             }
00118 
00119             parent::__construct($dataArray, $allowModifications);
00120         } else {
00121             if (!isset($config->$section)) {
00122                 require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00123                 throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Section '$section' cannot be found in $xml");
00124             }
00125 
00126             $dataArray = $this->_processExtends($config, $section);
00127             if (!is_array($dataArray)) {
00128                 // Section in the XML file contains just one top level string
00129                 $dataArray = array($section => $dataArray);
00130             }
00131 
00132             parent::__construct($dataArray, $allowModifications);
00133         }
00134 
00135         $this->_loadedSection = $section;
00136     }
00137 
00148     protected function _processExtends(SimpleXMLElement $element, $section, array $config = array())
00149     {
00150         if (!isset($element->$section)) {
00151             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00152             throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Section '$section' cannot be found");
00153         }
00154 
00155         $thisSection  = $element->$section;
00156         $nsAttributes = $thisSection->attributes(self::XML_NAMESPACE);
00157 
00158         if (isset($thisSection['extends']) || isset($nsAttributes['extends'])) {
00159             $extendedSection = (string) (isset($nsAttributes['extends']) ? $nsAttributes['extends'] : $thisSection['extends']);
00160             $this->_assertValidExtend($section, $extendedSection);
00161 
00162             if (!$this->_skipExtends) {
00163                 $config = $this->_processExtends($element, $extendedSection, $config);
00164             }
00165         }
00166 
00167         $config = $this->_arrayMergeRecursive($config, $this->_toArray($thisSection));
00168 
00169         return $config;
00170     }
00171 
00179     protected function _toArray(SimpleXMLElement $xmlObject)
00180     {
00181         $config       = array();
00182         $nsAttributes = $xmlObject->attributes(self::XML_NAMESPACE);
00183 
00184         // Search for parent node values
00185         if (count($xmlObject->attributes()) > 0) {
00186             foreach ($xmlObject->attributes() as $key => $value) {
00187                 if ($key === 'extends') {
00188                     continue;
00189                 }
00190 
00191                 $value = (string) $value;
00192 
00193                 if (array_key_exists($key, $config)) {
00194                     if (!is_array($config[$key])) {
00195                         $config[$key] = array($config[$key]);
00196                     }
00197 
00198                     $config[$key][] = $value;
00199                 } else {
00200                     $config[$key] = $value;
00201                 }
00202             }
00203         }
00204 
00205         // Search for local 'const' nodes and replace them
00206         if (count($xmlObject->children(self::XML_NAMESPACE)) > 0) {
00207             if (count($xmlObject->children()) > 0) {
00208                 require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00209                 throw new Zend_Config_Exception("A node with a 'const' childnode may not have any other children");
00210             }
00211 
00212             $dom                 = dom_import_simplexml($xmlObject);
00213             $namespaceChildNodes = array();
00214 
00215             // We have to store them in an array, as replacing nodes will
00216             // confuse the DOMNodeList later
00217             foreach ($dom->childNodes as $node) {
00218                 if ($node instanceof DOMElement && $node->namespaceURI === self::XML_NAMESPACE) {
00219                     $namespaceChildNodes[] = $node;
00220                 }
00221             }
00222 
00223             foreach ($namespaceChildNodes as $node) {
00224                 switch ($node->localName) {
00225                     case 'const':
00226                         if (!$node->hasAttributeNS(self::XML_NAMESPACE, 'name')) {
00227                             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00228                             throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Misssing 'name' attribute in 'const' node");
00229                         }
00230 
00231                         $constantName = $node->getAttributeNS(self::XML_NAMESPACE, 'name');
00232 
00233                         if (!defined($constantName)) {
00234                             require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00235                             throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Constant with name '$constantName' was not defined");
00236                         }
00237 
00238                         $constantValue = constant($constantName);
00239 
00240                         $dom->replaceChild($dom->ownerDocument->createTextNode($constantValue), $node);
00241                         break;
00242 
00243                     default:
00244                         require_once 'Zend/Config/Exception.php';
00245                         throw new Zend_Config_Exception("Unknown node with name '$node->localName' found");
00246                 }
00247             }
00248 
00249             return (string) simplexml_import_dom($dom);
00250         }
00251 
00252         // Search for children
00253         if (count($xmlObject->children()) > 0) {
00254             foreach ($xmlObject->children() as $key => $value) {
00255                 if (count($value->children()) > 0 || count($value->children(self::XML_NAMESPACE)) > 0) {
00256                     $value = $this->_toArray($value);
00257                 } else if (count($value->attributes()) > 0) {
00258                     $attributes = $value->attributes();
00259                     if (isset($attributes['value'])) {
00260                         $value = (string) $attributes['value'];
00261                     } else {
00262                         $value = $this->_toArray($value);
00263                     }
00264                 } else {
00265                     $value = (string) $value;
00266                 }
00267 
00268                 if (array_key_exists($key, $config)) {
00269                     if (!is_array($config[$key]) || !array_key_exists(0, $config[$key])) {
00270                         $config[$key] = array($config[$key]);
00271                     }
00272 
00273                     $config[$key][] = $value;
00274                 } else {
00275                     $config[$key] = $value;
00276                 }
00277             }
00278         } else if (!isset($xmlObject['extends']) && !isset($nsAttributes['extends']) && (count($config) === 0)) {
00279             // Object has no children nor attributes and doesn't use the extends
00280             // attribute: it's a string
00281             $config = (string) $xmlObject;
00282         }
00283 
00284         return $config;
00285     }

00295     protected function _arrayMergeRecursive($firstArray, $secondArray)
00296     {
00297         if (is_array($firstArray) && is_array($secondArray)) {
00298             foreach ($secondArray as $key => $value) {
00299                 if (isset($firstArray[$key])) {
00300                     $firstArray[$key] = $this->_arrayMergeRecursive($firstArray[$key], $value);
00301                 } else {
00302                     if($key === 0) {
00303                         $firstArray= array(0=>$this->_arrayMergeRecursive($firstArray, $value));
00304                     } else {
00305                         $firstArray[$key] = $value;
00306                     }
00307                 }
00308             }
00309         } else {
00310             $firstArray = $secondArray;
00311         }
00312 
00313         return $firstArray;
00314     }
